HRESULT INktDbModulesEnum::_NewEnum ( [out, retval] IUnknown **  ppUnk)
get

Retrieves an enumerable collection object.

Parameters
[out,retval]ppUnk Address of an interface pointer that on return points to the IUnknown interface of an enumerator object.
Returns
S_OK on success,
E_POINTER if ppUnk is NULL.
E_FAIL on general failure.
HRESULT INktDbModulesEnum::Count ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the total items count in this collection.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to store the item count. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
HRESULT INktDbModulesEnum::First ( [out, retval] INktDbModule **  ppDbMod)

Retrieves the first item in the collection.

Parameters
[in,out]ppDbModAddress of pointer to receive INktDbModule interface. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL if item not found.
HRESULT INktDbModulesEnum::GetAt ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] INktDbModule **  ppDbMod 
)

Retrieves the item at the specified index.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]ppDbModPointer to address to store the retrieved module interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if index parameter is out of bounds.
HRESULT INktDbModulesEnum::GetById ( [in] LONG  id,
[out, retval] INktDbModule **  ppDbMod 
)

Find a database module object by id.

Parameters
idDeviare object identifier.
[in,out]ppobjAddress of pointer to receive INktDbModule interface. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if devId is invalid.
NKTDV_ERR_NotFound if item not found (ppobj is set to NULL).

Parameters
nameThe name.
[in,out]ppDbObjectAddress of pointer to receive INktDbObject interface. Cannot be NULL.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if devId is invalid.
NKTDV_ERR_NotFound if item not found (ppDbObject is set to NULL).
